table.name: vtiger_vtewebhookrequests
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vtewebhookrequests` ( `vtewebhookrequestsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `vtewebhookrequestsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `workflow` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `source_module` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `action_title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `record_url` text DEFAULT NULL, `method` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `url` text DEFAULT NULL, `content_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `authorization_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `authorization_username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `authorization_password` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `request` text DEFAULT NULL, `request_date_time` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `request_response` text DEFAULT NULL, `mapped_response` text DEFAULT NULL, `update_to_vtiger` text DEFAULT NULL, `request_status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `source_record` integer(19) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtewebhookrequestsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_vtewebhookrequestscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vtewebhookrequestscf` ( `vtewebhookrequestsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtewebhookrequestsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
